input.description: Use case type. For example: ServiceDown
Connection data related to target in the event

May have incident information from the event. So, the data can be empty or has incident ID as below:
When empty: <itsm-data/>
When having incident ID <itsm-data> <incident-id>INC000111</incident-id> </itsm-data>
TBD: It may also contain information related CI's etc.

The flags xml set by each process after execution for next process. <flags> <status>true</status> <remediation-required>true<remediation-required> <continue-processing>true<continue-processing> <flags>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//status/text() = 'error'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation skipped due to earlier errors.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation skipped due to possible errors.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'false' or //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediatoin skipped.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//drop-event/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Dropping event due to earlier errors.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${error message}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(drop-event) = false"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not(contains('${status}', 'success'))"> <drop-event> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </drop-event> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(remediation-status) = false"> <remediation-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${status}</xsl:text> </remediation-status> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <continue-processing> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </continue-processing> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="drop-event"> <drop-event> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </drop-event> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="remediation-status"> <remediation-status>${status}</remediation-status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'true' and //change-created/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Awaiting Approval of Change Ticket.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'false' or //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Skipping remediation because remediation is not enabled or required.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'true' and //change-created/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Awaiting Approval of Change Ticket</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'false' or //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Skipping remediation because remediation is not enabled or required</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Skipping remediation because remediation..</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//continue-processing/text() = 'true' and //change-enabled/text() = 'true' and //change-created/text() = 'true' and //remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' "> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation skipped, awaiting change approval.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'false' "> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation bypassed</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation skipped due to earlier errors. Check flags and errors in processes.log files.</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> <remediation-status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">bypassed</xsl:text> </remediation-status> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <remediation-response> <status> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </status> <log> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation bypassed - awaiting approval</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' and //remediation-required/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation bypassed - due to possible earlier triage errors.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'false'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation is disabled.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation skipped to due to possible triage errors... please check logs.</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </log> </remediation-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

call-process.process-name: :BMC-SA-Event_Orchestration:Utilities:Get Workflow Name by Event Type and Action

input.value: Perform Remediation workflow for event type:

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="targetConnectionData">${target connectoin datsa}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <inputParameters> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">event data</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">target connection data</xsl:text> </name> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="$targetConnectionData" /> </value> </inputParameter> </inputParameters> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//command/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ============================================= </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//command-output/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ============================================= </xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//command/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">=============================================</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//command-output/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">=============================================</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=". = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${status}' != 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <remediation-response> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </remediation-response> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="XML"> <xsl:apply-templates select="./*" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="command-output"> <log> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </log> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'failure'"> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">false</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <continue-processing> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </continue-processing> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <remediation-status> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </remediation-status> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Perform Remediation for a given set of inputs: 1. Event Source Type 2. ITSM type 3. All Configurations - All module configurations required to determine if triage is required and type of remediation to be performed. 4. Event Data - Incoming event data 5. Continue processing - if this is false, traige step is skipped. This could be because event type is not supported. 6. Log error - if true, then, an error is logged in the target event system.
